text: We miss the old Kanye... Ahead of the release of his new album, Kanye West has been tweeting non - stop and proclaiming his love for Donald Trump. Now, it is being revealed he has a big request for the President — and it involves his youngest daughter Chicago. ` ` Kanye ’ s infatuated with Trump and is considering asking POTUS to be Chicago ’ s godfather,'' a source told In Touch exclusively. ` ` He loves, respects, and admires Trump and feels a man of his prestige and power would be a perfect influence in children ’ s lives.'' However, his wife Kim Kardashian is completely opposed to the idea. ` ` She despises Trump and doesn ’ t like what he stands for and is telling Ka
